entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. A few rain showers beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
